ingredients.ingredient: 10 ounces Dietz & Watson Roast Beef, Eye Round
2 thin slices Dietz & Watson New York State Aged Cheddar Cheese with Horseradish
4 slices Dietz & Watson Kosher Dill Pickles

cookingTips: Toast the sourdough lightly to provide structural support for the stacked filling
Arrange roast beef in layers for even distribution of flavor in each bite
Add toppings just before serving to prevent the bread from becoming soggy
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This premium sandwich needs quality ingredients and proper assembly. Toast the bread and layer the roast beef generously.
